TopicTitle: Stock KerbQuake - SQUAD I am disappoint!!!

Articles.Content:
Squad this game is already too bloated. Your adding too many featurez!!!

I demand kerb shake not have toggle button. Players need to get jacked stomach like me. NO PUCKERS!!!
It's just few lines of code to make it toggleable, it will not influence at all the performance. Why are you so upset?

> 
> Not just a toggle. There is a scaling tweak in the game settings screen. Set it to 0 for no wobble at all, or if you're brave (and very tolerant to motion sickness) set it to >1.
> In any case, this isn't a gratuitous shaky-cam effect. The camera isn't going to be constantly wobbling about just for show. The movement is always based on something, like pulling Gs, or atmospheric flight at very high speeds.
> 
> Cheers

No worries, you will get that and even more.

You may get used to it after a while too, I really liked KerbQuake.

I think the quote above should have been added to the blog itself.
I always intended to install Kerbquake! such a fantastic idea...until I realized that I never really use the IVA very much when doing maneuvers/launch!

> 
> It's just few lines of code to make it toggleable, it will not influence at all the performance. Why are you so upset?

But it makes the screen all busy and I dont like that. Their are way to many options already. We need less options! Ya know?

EDIT: I like pucking! It makes me skinny!
